name: GoodKnight
description:
The good knights want to expand the kingdom for the good king. Unfortunately they are ambushed by evil creatures of the forest! They must now fight with all their might to get rid of all the fairy flowers! Alas, their weapons are rubbish and they need the blacksmith to assist them in the heat of battle.

The Good Team:

Marc Anhoury :  Programmer 

Adem Aber Aouni : Programmer

Godefroy Juteau : Programmer

Tallulah Dumont:  2D Artist

Nicolas Pons : 3d artist

Mehdat Handbali : Sound designer
